scripts.prepare: (yes | sudo apt install screen); (yes | sudo apt install rsync); screen -S docker -d -m sudo docker-up
scripts.store-example: (cd packages/store-example; screen -S store-example -d -m npm run gitpod)
scripts.hasura-example: (cd packages/hasura-example; screen -S hasura-example -d -m npm run gitpod; sleep 20; npm run unmigrate && npm run migrate)
scripts.hasura: (cd packages/hasura; screen -S hasura -d -m npm run gitpod)
scripts.start: npm install; (npm run prepare; npm run packages; sleep 3; npm run hasura; sleep 10; npm run store-example; sleep 10; npm run hasura-example;)
